pullRequest.title: Refactoring + Fixes to Block Handlers
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

This Pull Request is meant to replace the old SlimefunBlockHandler in the future.
Slimefun has been using an ItemHandler-based system for quite some time now and block-breaking should finally be transferred over.
This will also fix two bugs.
Related Issues



Resolves #2560

Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I have added Nonnull and Nullable annotations to my methods to indicate their behaviour for null values
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

nodes.bodyText: should use isAir, if we're doing an air check may as well make it future proof. Who knows what MC, Spigot or other plugins will do

would be great if we could cancel without disabling all explosions. If we had the event we could cancel and then check if cancelled above.
Would be nice for cases like, block durability (for like factions), allows explosion if out of electricity, etc.
